get.description: This API fetches the details of an organization from your help desk.

patch.description: This API updates the details of an organization.

get.description: This API fetches the favicon set for an organization/portal in your help desk.

post.description: This API updates the favicon set for an organization/portal in your help desk.

delete.description: This API updates the favicon set for an organization/portal in your help desk.

post.description: This API updates the default organization for the current user in Zoho Desk.

get.description: This API fetches the logo set for an organization/portal in your help desk.

post.description:
This API updates the logo set for an organization/portal in your help desk.

Note: To upload organization logo generate OAuthToken for the scope: Desk.settings.UPDATE,profile.orglogo.UPDATE or Desk.basic.UPDATE,profile.orglogo.UPDATE

delete.description: This API deletes the logo set for an organization/portal in your help desk.

get.description: This API lists all organizations to which the current user belongs.
This API lists all organizations which can be accessed using the current Oauth token.
This API checks if multiple organizations have the same portal name. Get prior concern from desk team before using this API with OAuth authorization

parameters.name: portalName
parameters.description: Unique name of the help desk portal. Only lower-case letters and numbers are allowed in the name.

schema.description: Unique name of the help desk portal. Only lower-case letters and numbers are allowed in the name.

fileSize.name: fileSize
fileSize.description: Size of the image file to download. Values allowed are @THUMBNAIL@ (image with reduced dimensions and size) and @ACTUAL@ (image with actual dimensions and size). The default value is @ACTUAL@.

schema.description: Size of the image file to download. Values allowed are @THUMBNAIL@ (image with reduced dimensions and size) and @ACTUAL@ (image with actual dimensions and size). The default value is @ACTUAL@.
